name: 0he

body.origin:
|- whe(emptycls, c0)
-| wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0)
-| wb(whe(emptycls, c0), wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- whe(emptycls, c0)
-| wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0)
-| wb(whe(emptycls, c0), wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0))

body.origin:
|- wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0)
-| wceq(cima(emptycls, c0), emptycls)
-| wss(emptycls, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- whe(emptycls, c0)
-| wb(whe(emptycls, c0), wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0))
-| wceq(cima(emptycls, c0), emptycls)
-| wss(emptycls, c0)

|- whe(emptycls, c0)
-| wb(whe(emptycls, c0), wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0))
-| wss(emptycls, c0)

|- whe(emptycls, c0)
-| wb(whe(emptycls, c0), wss(cima(emptycls, c0), c0))

comment: The empty relation is hereditary in any class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
